title: Spring rolls
description: Use the banana in this recipe as a sort of edible ‘glue stick’ to hold the spring roll sheets together. The lemongrass sweet chilli sauce that the spring rolls are served with is a handy dip to know how to make.
ingredients: 1 pack spring roll wrappers (12-6 sheets needed, depending how big you wish to make the spring rolls)
½ carrot, cut into thin strips
½ red pepper, cut into thin strips
salt and black pepper, to taste
2 stalks lemongrass, bashed and finely chopped
